com.mesosphere.sdk.http.queries

Class PodQueries

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.http.queries.PodQueries

  • public final class PodQueries
extends java.lang.Object
    A read-only API for accessing information about the pods which compose the service, and restarting/replacing those pods.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  PodQueries.FailureSetter
      Broken out into a separate callback to simplify unit testing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Response getInfo(StateStore stateStore, java.lang.String podInstanceName)
      Produces the full information for a single pod instance.
      static Response getStatus(StateStore stateStore, java.lang.String podInstanceName)
      Produces the summary status of a single pod instance.
      static Response getStatuses(StateStore stateStore, java.lang.String serviceName)
      Produces the summary statuses of all pod instances.
      static Response list(StateStore stateStore)
      Produces a listing of all pod instance names.
      static Response pause(StateStore stateStore, java.lang.String podName, java.lang.String bodyPayload)
      Restarts a pod in a "paused" debug mode.
      static Response restart(StateStore stateStore, ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> configStore, java.lang.String podInstanceName, RecoveryType recoveryType)
      Restarts a pod instance in-place.
      (package private) static Response restartPod(StateStore stateStore, ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> configStore, java.lang.String podInstanceName, RecoveryType recoveryType, PodQueries.FailureSetter failureSetter) 
      static Response resume(StateStore stateStore, java.lang.String podName, java.lang.String bodyPayload)
      Restarts a pod in a normal state following a prior "pause" command.
